title: Only in Swiss!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Emma-san, what’s the thing that you’re most shocked about when you came to Japan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hmm…. I wonder…. Maybe it’s the fact that there’s no contest for cows and sheep<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Contest for cows and sheep?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yes. Every year near where I used to live we have a contest to decide which cows and sheep are the best~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>How is the best decided zura?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Umm, physique, how big it is is obvious, elegance of their faces, how gallant it looks while standing, it’s decided through things like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Elegance…. Gallant…. To understand parts of cows and sheep like that, Swiss people are amazing zura<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Of course there are people who don’t get it, but when you look at them everyday you might get an understanding~. Look, Chika-chan is also great at discerning delicious mikan too right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ha-....! Speaking of which, that’s true zura!! When you think about it, that's amazing too zura!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu. With that said, Hanamaru-chan might also be good at discerning interesting books~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
